name: MazeQuest 2
description: The King has been kidnapped, and the land of Reynard is under siege! Gather a party, and travel your way to different lands on a quest to re-seal an ancient evil. MazeQuest is a throwback to the 16 bit RPG era, with colorful 2d graphics and top-down turn based combat.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 1GB / Radeon R7 250X 1GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
